name: Endless Burger
description:
This game was made for LOWREZJAM 2016, and game jam in which the game must be in a resolution of 64x64 pixels (or lower).

Use the arrow keys to collect ingredients for a cheeseburger. Avoid the top bun as long as you can. When you do get the top bun your game is over! See how how you can go!

If the arrow keys don't work right away, try refreshing! I've had issues with Libgdx's web player before!
